name: SongMan-GuessMovieorAlbumNameofthesong
0:
”Alexa, Start Song Man”
”Alexa, Open Song Man”
”Alexa, Launch Song Man”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: song man
des:
Song Man is the Fun Game of identifying Movie or Album name of the song from 6 Indian Languages like Hindi, Tamil, Punjabi, Telugu, Kannada and Malayalam. Open Song Man launches the game, Once you are inside, choose the language of you desire and answer the multiple choice question between 1 and 4. 'Stop' or 'Cancel' to end skill. It is that Simple. 

250+ Hindi Songs
450+ Tamil Songs
300+ Kannada Songs
250+ Punjabi Songs
300+ Telugu Songs
300+ Malayalam Songs
and working on more Song data base and new language. 

All bathroom singers and song lovers, Have fun with Song Man, We are sure you love it. Don't forget to rate it if you like it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
